definition.name: Update project
definition.description: Updates an item's fields on a GitHub Projects (beta) board based on a workflow dispatch (or other) event's input.
definition.author: github

inputs.name: organization
inputs.description: The organization that contains the project, defaults to the current repository owner

inputs.name: project_number
inputs.description: The project number from the project's URL

inputs.name: content_id
inputs.description: The global ID of the issue or pull request within the project

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: The field on the project to set the value of

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The value to set the project field to. Only required for operation type read

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: A GitHub Token with access to both the source issue and the destination project (`repo` and `write:org` scopes)

outputs.name: project_id
outputs.description: The global ID of the project

outputs.name: item_id
outputs.description: The global ID of the issue or pull request

outputs.name: item_title
outputs.description: The title of the issue or pull request

outputs.name: field_id
outputs.description: The global ID of the field

outputs.name: field_read_value
outputs.description: The value of the field before the update

outputs.name: field_updated_value
outputs.description: The value of the field after the update

outputs.name: field_type
outputs.description: The updated field's ProjectV2FieldType (text, single_select, number, date, or iteration)

outputs.name: option_id
outputs.description: The global ID of the selected option
